    "content": "This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: CoreGui
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  The CoreGui is a service used to store Guis created in-game by Roblox for the
  core user interface found in every game (such as the game menu, the
  playerlist, the backpack, etc.). It can also be used by Class.Plugin|Plugins
  in Roblox Studio.
description: |
  The CoreGui is a service used to store Guis created in-game by Roblox for the
  core user interface found in every game (such as the game menu, the
  playerlist, the backpack, etc.). It can also be used by Class.Plugin|Plugins
  in Roblox Studio.

  You can use the Class.StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled() and
  Class.StarterGui:GetCoreGuiEnabled() methods in a Class.LocalScript to
  enable and disable most elements of the CoreGui. You can also use
  Class.PlayerGui:SetTopbarTransparency() to set the transparency of the top
  bar.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - BasePlayerGui
descendants: []
tags:

  - Service
  - NotReplicated
deprecationmessage: ''

    tags: []

      write: RobloxScriptSecurity
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Appearance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: CoreGui.Version
    summary: |
      The current version of the CoreGui. Every time the CoreGui is majorly
      changed, this number is increased.
    description: |
